text: As your application grows, your database will need to grow as well.
But today's document database management tools are
often expensive, slow to scale or impact performance
during scaling. So database administrators and
developers often need to choose between ease of management, scalability
and cost.
Amazon DocumentDB is our fully managed,
native JSON database built with a flexible schema for
enterprise applications.
It provides the flexibility of a document database without time
consuming administrative tasks.
Built for performance at scale ,Amazon DocumentDB decouples
storage and compute so each scales independently.
And now, we've built on this technology with our new
feature Amazon DocumentDB Elastic Clusters. So you
can scale your document database to millions of reads and writes per
second.
Scale virtually any application with little to no
downtime or performance impact.
Plus, Elastic Clusters are designed to scale
in and out as workloads evolve.
And storing petabytes of data is easy and cost-effective
with the AWS Cloud.
Costs are predictable - only pay for the capacity
you consume without managing the underlying infrastructure.
And now, users can scale virtually any application without sacrificing
performance or ease of use.
Meet the needs of your most demanding document workloads - without
breaking the bank with Amazon DocumentDB Elastic
Clusters.
